CustomField.formula: IF( Followup_Date__c > TOday(), IMAGE('https://img.icons8.com/color/48/000000/low-importance--v1.png', 'Not due',15,15), IF ( Followup_Date__c == TODAY(), IMAGE('https://img.icons8.com/color/48/000000/medium-priority.png', 'Due Today', 15,15), IMAGE( 'https://img.icons8.com/color/48/000000/high-priority.png', 'Overdue', 15,15) ) )
CustomField.label: Followup Overdue
